items.title: Four journalists among 15 dead in Israeli strike on hospital, Gaza officials say
items.description: The strikes on Nasser Hospital in Khan Younis are said to have killed journalists working for international media.

items.title: 'Half alive': Toxic mushroom lunch survivor tells court of murders' impact
items.description: Family members of the three people Erin Patterson murdered with toxic mushrooms have confronted her in court.

items.title: Medvedev beaten after photographer enters court
items.description: Daniil Medvedev is out of the US Open after a remarkable defeat by Benjamin Bonzi, where a photographer walking on to the court changed the course of ...

items.title: Hongkongers squawk-off in city's first bird call contest
items.description: Bird lovers dressed up and took to the stage to mimic rhythmic calls in a competition aimed at promoting conservation awareness.

items.title: Jerry Adler, who starred in The Sopranos, dies aged 96
items.description: Adler started acting in his early 60s, after some 30 years working behind the scenes on Broadway.
